  24. /*
  25. * This structure is defined inconsistently. mingw64 has it in ntdef.h (which
  26. * doesn't look like a primary header) and technically it's part of ntifs.h in
  27. * the WDK. Requiring the WDK is a bit extreme, so the definition is taken from
  28. * ntdef.h. Both ntdef.h and ntifs.h define REPARSE_DATA_BUFFER_HEADER_SIZE
  29. */
  30. #ifndef REPARSE_DATA_BUFFER_HEADER_SIZE
